data.name: AuthToken_OnInsertNewbe_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
/* Test for trigger [Auth].[AuthToken_OnInsertNewbe]
User after authentification had to have SignUpDate and TLChat transport Thet test insert new user, then add auth token for him and verify SignUpDate and transport */
declare @uid uniqueidentifier declare @signup datetime
SET @uid = NEWID()
--insert new user insert into [Usr].[User] ([Id], [IsConsultant]) values (@uid, 1)
--first result set select u.[SignUpDate], t.[TransportTypeId] from [Usr].[User] u left join [Usr].[Transport] t on u.[Id] = t.[UserId] and t.[TransportTypeId] = 0 where u.[Id] = @uid
insert into [Auth].[AuthToken] ([UserId], [Token], [IssueDate], [ExpireBy]) values (@uid, cast(RAND() as nvarchar(255)), GETDATE(), 300)
--after insert auth token, user's SignUpDate must has value, and user mush has flchat transport select CASE WHEN u.[SignUpDate] is null THEN 1 WHEN ABS(DATEDIFF(minute, GETUTCDATE(), u.[SignUpDate])) > 1 THEN 2 ELSE 0 END , t.[TransportTypeId] from [Usr].[User] u inner join [Usr].[Transport] t on u.[Id] = t.[UserId] and t.[TransportTypeId] = 0 where u.[Id] = @uid
-- update SingUpDate for verify second auth not update value update [Usr].[User] set [SignUpDate] = cast('1990-10-20T00:00:00' as datetime) where [Id] = @uid
--make second auth insert into [Auth].[AuthToken] ([UserId], [Token], [IssueDate], [ExpireBy]) values (@uid, cast(RAND() as nvarchar(255)), GETDATE(), 300)
--and check values select CASE WHEN u.[SignUpDate] is null THEN 1 WHEN ABS(DATEDIFF(minute, '1990-10-20T00:00:00', u.[SignUpDate])) > 1 THEN 2 ELSE 0 END , t.[TransportTypeId] from [Usr].[User] u inner join [Usr].[Transport] t on u.[Id] = t.[UserId] and t.[TransportTypeId] = 0 where u.[Id] = @uid
delete from [Usr].[Transport] where [UserId] = @uid delete from [Auth].[AuthToken] where [UserId] = @uid delete from [Usr].[User] where [Id] = @uid

data.name: AuthToken_InsertVerification_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
/* Test trigger [Auth].[AuthToken_InsertVerification]
taken can't be added for disabled user */
declare @uid uniqueidentifier SET @uid = NEWID()
--insert new user insert into [Usr].[User] ([Id], [IsConsultant], [Enabled]) values (@uid, 1, 0)
begin try insert into [Auth].[AuthToken] ([UserId], [Token], [IssueDate], [ExpireBy]) values (@uid, cast(RAND() as nvarchar(255)), GETDATE(), 300)
select 0 end try begin catch --select select 1 end catch
delete from [Usr].[Transport] where [UserId] = @uid; delete from [Usr].[User] where [Id] = @uid

data.name: AuthToken_OnInserNewbe_CheckEnableTransports_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
/* Test for trigger [Auth].[AuthToken_OnInsertNewbe]
enable FLChat transport action does not enbale other transports */
declare @uid uniqueidentifier
SET @uid = NEWID()
--insert new user insert into [Usr].[User] ([Id], [IsConsultant]) values (@uid, 1)
insert into [Usr].[Transport] ([UserId], [TransportTypeId], [TransportOuterId], [Enabled]) values (@uid, /**FLChat**/0, NULL, 0), (@uid, /**Test**/-1, cast(@uid as nvarchar(255)), 0)
--#1 - must be empty select [TransportTypeId] from [Usr].[Transport] where [UserId] = @uid and [TransportTypeId] in (0, -1) and [Enabled] = 1
insert into [Auth].[AuthToken] ([UserId], [Token], [IssueDate], [ExpireBy]) values (@uid, cast(RAND() as nvarchar(255)), GETDATE(), 300)
--#2 must be value 1 (Enabled) for FLChat select [Enabled] from [Usr].[Transport] where [UserId] = @uid and [TransportTypeId] = 0
--#3 must be value 0 (Disabled) for Test select [Enabled] from [Usr].[Transport] where [UserId] = @uid and [TransportTypeId] = -1
delete from [Usr].[Transport] where [UserId] = @uid delete from [Auth].[AuthToken] where [UserId] = @uid delete from [Usr].[User] where [Id] = @uid
